attributes.action: Help people with Key Metres during Covid-19 Lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Starving and being freezing. PLEASE can you discuss what you plan to do to help the people in this scary time.
attributes.background: During this scary time I beg the government to help people on key metres for their electricity.
